backend/main.mo: Motoko backend implementing user profiles, RBAC-checked actions, and trip creation/join logic with map-based storage.
feature_evidence.json: Structured feature evidence report mapping implemented features to files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: List of frontend file paths with short human‑written summaries of each component or page.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML shell loading the React app entrypoint.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main router and layout logic handling authentication, profile setup, and routing to all app pages.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Admin-only access denial screen with navigation back to home.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button integrating Internet Identity with loading and error handling.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Mandatory first‑time profile setup modal allowing users to submit their name.
Layout component providing navigation, responsive mobile menu, and admin-only links based on user role.
frontend/src/components/travel/TripFormD: Dialog form for creating a new trip, validating inputs and submitting data via useCreateTrip.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages the backend actor based on identity, refreshing dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context provider and hooks for Internet Identity authentication, managing login state and identity loading.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, roles, admin checks, and travel pool trips.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS base file defining theme variables, light/dark color tokens, and global styles.
frontend/src/lib/travel/emissions.ts: Utility to calculate carbon emissions per trip using distance, vehicle type, and passenger count.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point wiring QueryClient, InternetIdentityProvider, global styles, and rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/AdminAuditLogPage.tsx: Admin-only page showing a placeholder audit log or access denied if user lacks privileges.
frontend/src/pages/AdminNoticesPage.tsx: Admin-only page showing placeholder UI for managing timetable notices.
frontend/src/pages/AdminSafetyReportsPag: Admin-only page displaying a placeholder section for reviewing safety reports.
frontend/src/pages/EmailSummarizerPage.t: Page for pasting email content and running a client-side heuristic analysis to generate summaries and metadata.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Landing page with Internet Identity login and feature overview cards.
frontend/src/pages/MessMenuPage.tsx: Page showing a placeholder for the daily mess menu feature.
frontend/src/pages/PrivacyPage.tsx: Static page describing data storage, visibility, and admin access policies.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: User settings page allowing profile edits, interests management, and saving updates.
frontend/src/pages/TimetablePage.tsx: Page with placeholder UI for managing and viewing a personal timetable.
frontend/src/pages/TravelPoolPage.tsx: Travel pool listing page showing existing trips, creation options, and trip details links.
frontend/src/pages/TravelTripDetailsPage: React page that displays trip details, handles join/delete actions, and shows loading or not‑found states using hooks and UI components.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and cleaning them from hash-based routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS config extending colors, animations, container settings, and enabling typography, container queries, and animation plugins.
project_state.json: Project state metadata describing features, architecture notes, images, and versioning for a campus companion app.
